episodes.title: A Silenced Woman's Voice
episodes.description: Samantha Sorensen returns to discuss her book, "Non-Consensual Morality: A Silenced Woman's Voice from the Dark." TW: This episode includes topics of SA that may not be suitable for some viewers.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Mormon Traditions (Not for the Faint of Heart)
episodes.description: The Brother of Jared and Heavenly Mother chat about some unhinged traditions in the church. These are not doctrinal, or even specific to church culture topics. From pageants, Temple open houses, and stake musicals, we get into it.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: "Keep the Crazy Inside"
episodes.description: Author of the book "Nonconsensual Morality: A Silenced Woman's Voice from the Dark" Samantha Sorensen is interviewed by Heavenly Mother. Sorensen's book is available on Amazon, Ebooks, and Barnes and Noble.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: We Still Love Star Wars
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and The Harlot Isabel discuss the politics of Star Wars and how our love of Star Wars remains, even after leaving the church. Disclaimer: Heavenly Mother is highly opinionated and if that's stressful we understand you can sit in the foyer and come back on another episode. We are happy to have you here! ‘Star Wars’ Is Still Intact: Re-Finding Yourself in the Age of Trump by Alysha V. Scarlett
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Utah Politics and the Church
episodes.description: The Harlot Isabel informs Heavenly Mother on the ways Utah politics were directly impacted by The Church during her career in Utah. The full title of her book is " 'Star Wars Is Still Intact' Re-Finding Yourself in the Age of Trump" by Alysha V. Scarlett.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Replacing Bishops
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and The Harlot Isabel discuss how sometimes trusting counselors or authority figures too easily can be a side effect of leaving Mormonism. The Harlot Isabel, real name Alysha, is a published author, her book 'Star Wars' Is Still Intact: Re-Finding Yourself in the Age of Trump is available online or at various book stores nationwide.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Interview with The Harlot Isabel
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother is joined by The Harlot Isabel to tell her story.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Faith Not to be Healed?!
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and Brother The Brother of Jared discuss how the church does not heal anyone ever
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Self-care as ExMormons
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and Brother The Brother of Jared discuss self-care as ExMormons. Exciting! Please send comments, concerns, conundrums to our new email exexmormon@gmail.com
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: How It's Going
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and Elder Sister check in with how being an Ex Mormon is going (spoiler it's fantastic on the other side).
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Cringe Words
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and Elder Sister list off words and phrases unique to the Mormon vocabulary.

episodes.title: Shame Part 1

episodes.title: Elder Sister's Story
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother is joined by Elder Sister in today's episode.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Tall Tales from Mormon Missions
episodes.description: Heavenly Mother and Methuselah discuss the rich oral tradition of missionary "Tall Tales" or "Legends", and deconstruct several "totally true events" shared amongst missionaries. We also discuss how our humanity leaks out of such stories, and how they become a unique window into the hopes and fears of missionaries on the mission.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Forgiveness Culture
